trans-unit.source: Provides access to the shared speech recognition service available on the Windows desktop.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller åtkomst till delade speech recognition tjänst som är tillgänglig på Windows-skrivbordet.

trans-unit.source: Applications use the shared recognizer to access Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: Program använder delad tolkning komma åt Windows Taligenkänning.

trans-unit.source: Use the SpeechRecognizer object to add to the Windows speech user experience.
trans-unit.target: Använd SpeechRecognizer objektet för att lägga till Windows-användarupplevelse för tal.

trans-unit.source: This class provides control over various aspects of the speech recognition process: - To manage speech recognition grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen ger kontroll över olika aspekter av igenkänningsprocessen tal: – Om du vill hantera speech recognition grammatik, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To get information about current speech recognition operations, subscribe to the SpeechRecognizer’s <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill hämta information om aktuella speech recognition åtgärder, prenumerera på SpeechRecognizer <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>händelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: - To view or modify the number of alternate results the recognizer returns, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill visa eller ändra antalet alternativa resultat som returnerar tolken, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.MaxAlternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer returns recognition results in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Tolken returnerar resultat i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: - To access or monitor the state of the shared recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioSignalProblemOccurred>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill övervaka status för delad tolkning, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>Egenskaper och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioSignalProblemOccurred>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>händelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioSignalProblemOccurred> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.PauseRecognizerOnRecognition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To synchronize changes to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Om du vill synkronisera ändringar i tolken, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer uses more than one thread to perform tasks.
trans-unit.target: Delad tolkning använder mer än en tråd för att utföra uppgifter.

trans-unit.source: - To emulate input to the shared recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: – För att emulera indata för delad tolkning, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The configuration of Windows Speech Recognition is managed by the use of the **Speech Properties** dialog in the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurationen av Windows Taligenkänning hanteras med hjälp av den **Talegenskaper** dialogrutan i den **Kontrollpanelen**.

trans-unit.source: This interface is used to select the default desktop speech recognition engine and language, the audio input device, and the sleep behavior of speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Det här gränssnittet används för att välja standard skrivbord taligenkänningsmotorn och språk, enhet för ljudinspelning och strömsparläge beteendet för taligenkänning.

trans-unit.source: If the configuration of Windows Speech Recognition is changed while the application is running, (for instance, if speech recognition is disabled or the input language is changed), the change affects all SpeechRecognizer objects.
trans-unit.target: Om konfigurationen av Windows Taligenkänning ändras medan programmet körs (till exempel om taligenkänning är inaktiverat eller inmatningsspråk ändras), påverkas alla SpeechRecognizer-objekt.

trans-unit.source: To create an in-process speech recognizer that is independent of Windows Speech Recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> class.
trans-unit.target: Använd för att skapa en pågående taligenkänningen som är oberoende av Windows Taligenkänning <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>klass.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Dispose%2A>innan du släpper ditt senaste referens till taligenkänningen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the recognizer object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Annars resurser den använder frigörs inte förrän skräpinsamlingen anropar tolken objektets `Finalize` metod.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object maintains a separate set of speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Varje <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>objekt upprätthåller en separat uppsättning tal recognition grammatik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio being received by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar formatet för ljud tas emot av taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: The audio input format for the speech recognizer, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the input to the recognizer is not configured.
trans-unit.target: Indataformatet för taligenkänningen, ljud eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om indata till tolken inte är konfigurerad.

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of the audio being received by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar nivån för den tas emot av taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: The audio level of the input to the speech recognizer, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: Ljud andelen indata för taligenkänningen, mellan 0 och 100.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the shared recognizer reports the level of its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när delad tolkning rapporterar nivån av dess ljudinsignal.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event multiple times per second.
trans-unit.target: Tolken genererar den här händelsen flera gånger per sekund.

trans-unit.source: The frequency with which the event is raised depends on the computer on which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Den frekvens som händelsen visas beror på den dator där programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio level at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: För att få nivån ljud vid tidpunkten för händelsen, använder du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>egenskapen i associerade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio level of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill skaffa den aktuella ljud indata till tolken, använder du tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `AudioLevelUpdated` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en `AudioLevelUpdated` händelse, identifierar du den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location in the audio stream being generated by the device that is providing input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den aktuella platsen i ljudström som skapas av den enhet som tillhandahåller indata för taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer receives input while the desktop speech recognition is running.
trans-unit.target: Delad tolkning tar emot indata medan skrivbord taligenkänning körs.

trans-unit.source: The `AudioPosition` property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Den `AudioPosition` refererar till den indataenhet position i den genererade ljudströmmen.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position in processing audio input.
trans-unit.target: Däremot kommer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>refererar till den tolken position i bearbetning ljudinsignal.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Dessa platser kan vara olika.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the AudioPosition property.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om tolken har tagit emot indata för vilka det har inte ännu genereras ett recognition resultat och värdet för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>egenskapen är mindre än värdet på egenskapen AudioPosition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current location in the speech recognizer's audio input stream through which it has received input.
trans-unit.target: Den aktuella platsen i den taligenkänningen ljud Indataströmmen som har tagit emot indata.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer encounters a problem in the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när tolken påträffar ett problem i ljud signalen.

trans-unit.source: To get which problem occurred, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Använd <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>egenskapen för den associera <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> för att få vilka problem uppstod

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en `AudioSignalProblemOccurred` händelse, identifierar du den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the audio being received by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar status för ljud tas emot av taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: The state of the audio input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Status för ljud indata för taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the state changes in the audio being received by the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när tillståndsändringar i ljuduppspelningen tas emot av tolken.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio state at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: För att få ljud tillståndet vid tidpunkten för händelsen, använder du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>egenskapen i associerade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio state of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: För att hämta indata till tolken aktuella ljud tillstånd, använder du tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about audio state, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om ljud tillstånd finns det <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `AudioStateChanged` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en `AudioStateChanged` händelse, identifierar du den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Förfogar den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Förfogar den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objekt och versioner av de resurser som används under sessionen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både hanterade och ohanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att släppa endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Emulerar indata av en fras till delade taligenkänningen med text i stället för ljud för synkron taligenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare som levereras med Vista och Windows 7 Ignorera skiftläge och tecknet bredd när du använder grammatik regler för inkommande frasen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om den här typen av jämförelse finns i <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>uppräkningen värden <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>och <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Identifierarna också Ignorera nya rader och extra blanksteg och skiljetecken behandlas som litteralt indata.

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Indata för igenkänning igen.

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.
trans-unit.target: Recognition resultatet för igenkänning-åtgärden eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, om det går inte att genomföra åtgärden eller Windows Taligenkänning är den **i viloläge** tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerar indata för specifika ord för taligenkänningen delad med text i stället för ljud för synkron taligenkänning och anger hur tolken hanterar Unicode jämförelse mellan orden och läsa in speech recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object using the information provided in the `wordUnits` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden skapar en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objekt med hjälp av informationen i den `wordUnits` parameter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Tolken använder den `compareOptions` när det gäller grammatik regler för inkommande frasen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare som levereras med Vista och Windows 7 Ignorera skiftläge om den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>eller <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>värdet finns.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Identifierarna Ignorera alltid teckenbredden och aldrig Ignorera Kana-typen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Identifierarna också Ignorera nya rader och extra blanksteg och skiljetecken behandlas som litteralt indata.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om teckenbredden och Kana-typ, den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En matris med word enheter som innehåller indata för igenkänning igen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av uppräkningsvärdena som beskriver typ av jämförelse som ska användas för emulerade recognition igen.

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.
trans-unit.target: Recognition resultatet för igenkänning-åtgärden eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, om det går inte att genomföra åtgärden eller Windows Taligenkänning är den **i viloläge** tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the phrase and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerar indata av en fras till delade taligenkänningen med text i stället för ljud för synkron taligenkänning och anger hur tolken hanterar Unicode jämförelse mellan frasen och läsa in speech recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Tolken använder den `compareOptions` när det gäller grammatik regler för inkommande frasen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare som levereras med Vista och Windows 7 Ignorera skiftläge om den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>eller <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>värdet finns.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Identifierarna Ignorera alltid teckenbredden och aldrig Ignorera Kana-typen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Identifierarna också Ignorera nya rader och extra blanksteg och skiljetecken behandlas som litteralt indata.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om teckenbredden och Kana-typ, den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The input phrase for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Inkommande frasen för igenkänning igen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av uppräkningsvärdena som beskriver typ av jämförelse som ska användas för emulerade recognition igen.

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the operation is not successful or Windows Speech Recognition is in the **Sleeping** state.
trans-unit.target: Recognition resultatet för igenkänning-åtgärden eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, om det går inte att genomföra åtgärden eller Windows Taligenkänning är den **i viloläge** tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for asynchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Emulerar indata av en fras till delade taligenkänningen med text i stället för ljud för asynkron taligenkänning.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare som levereras med Vista och Windows 7 Ignorera skiftläge och tecknet bredd när du använder grammatik regler för inkommande frasen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.

trans-unit.target: Identifierarna också Ignorera nya rader och extra blanksteg och skiljetecken behandlas som litteralt indata.

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Indata för igenkänning igen.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the shared speech recognizer, using text instead of audio for asynchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emulerar indata för specifika ord för taligenkänningen delad med text i stället för ljud för asynkron taligenkänning och anger hur tolken hanterar Unicode jämförelse mellan orden och läsa in speech recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object using the information provided in the `wordUnits` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden skapar en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objekt med hjälp av informationen i den `wordUnits` parameter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses the `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Tolken använder den `compareOptions` när det gäller grammatik regler för inkommande frasen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare som levereras med Vista och Windows 7 Ignorera skiftläge om den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>eller <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>värdet finns.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers always ignore the character width and never ignore the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: Identifierarna Ignorera alltid teckenbredden och aldrig Ignorera Kana-typen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Identifierarna också Ignorera nya rader och extra blanksteg och skiljetecken behandlas som litteralt indata.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om teckenbredden och Kana-typ, den <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En matris med word enheter som innehåller indata för igenkänning igen.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av uppräkningsvärdena som beskriver typ av jämförelse som ska användas för emulerade recognition igen.

trans-unit.target: Inkommande frasen för igenkänning igen.

trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av uppräkningsvärdena som beskriver typ av jämförelse som ska användas för emulerade recognition igen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the shared recognizer finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation for emulated input.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när delad tolkning Slutför en asynkron recognition åtgärd för emulerade indata.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method begins an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Varje <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoden börjar en asynkron recognition åtgärd.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` event when it finalizes the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Tolken aktiverar den `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` händelse när den Slutför den asynkrona åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous recognition operation can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: Asynkron recognition åtgärden kan öka den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized>händelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The EmulateRecognizeCompleted event is the last such event that the recognizer raises for a given operation.
trans-unit.target: Händelsen EmulateRecognizeCompleted är sist sådan händelse att tolken genererar för en viss åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for an `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en `EmulateRecognizeCompleted` händelse, identifierar du den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object is ready to process speech.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om detta <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objekt är redo att utföra taligenkänning.

trans-unit.source: Changes to this property do not affect other instances of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class.
trans-unit.target: Ändringar i den här egenskapen påverkar inte andra instanser av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>klassen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of the Enabled property is `true` for a newly instantiated instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard är värdet för egenskapen Enabled `true` för en nyligen instansierad <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> -instans

trans-unit.source: While the recognizer is disabled, none of the recognizer's speech recognition grammars are available for recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Medan tolken är inaktiverat kan ingen av de tolken speech recognition grammatik för igenkänning åtgärder.

trans-unit.source: Setting the recognizer's Enabled property has no effect on the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den tolk aktiverad egenskapen har ingen effekt på tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object is performing speech recognition; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den här <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objekt utför taligenkänning, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects that are loaded in this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en samling av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekt som lästs in i den här <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> instans.

trans-unit.source: This property does not return any speech recognition grammars loaded by another application.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen returnerar inte några tal recognition grammatik läses in av ett annat program.

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects that the application loaded into the current instance of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekt som programmet läses in i den aktuella instansen av delad tolkning.

trans-unit.source: Loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Läser in en speech recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Delad tolkning genererar ett undantag om speech recognition grammatik har redan lästs in, läses asynkront eller inte gick att läsa in i alla tolken.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Om tolken körs program använda <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>att pausa taligenkänningsmotorn före inläsning av, inaktivera, aktivera eller inaktivera en grammatik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill läsa in en speech recognition grammatik asynkront, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: Tal recognition grammatik att läsa in.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously loads a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Läser in en speech recognition grammatik asynkront.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer completes this asynchronous operation, it raises a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: När den här asynkrona åtgärden har slutförts i tolken den genererar en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>händelse.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the speech recognition grammar is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Tolken genererar ett undantag om speech recognition grammatik har redan lästs in, läses asynkront eller inte gick att läsa in i alla tolken.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Om tolken körs program använda <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>att pausa taligenkänningsmotorn före inläsning av, inaktivera, aktivera eller inaktivera en grammatik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To load a speech recognition grammar synchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill läsa in en speech recognition grammatik synkront, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition grammar to load.
trans-unit.target: Tal recognition grammatik att läsa in.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer finishes the asynchronous loading of a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när tolken är klar Asynkron inläsning av en speech recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>metod som initierar en asynkron åtgärd.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `LoadGrammarCompleted` event when it completes the operation.
trans-unit.target: Tolken aktiverar den `LoadGrammarCompleted` händelse när åtgärden slutförts.

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that the recognizer loaded, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Att hämta <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt som tolken har lästs in, Använd <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>egenskapen i associerade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To get the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects the recognizer has loaded, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Att hämta aktuellt <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt tolken har lästs in, använder tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a `LoadGrammarCompleted` event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en `LoadGrammarCompleted` händelse, identifierar du den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the shared recognizer returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger det maximala antalet alternativa resultat som delad tolkning returnerar för varje recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> class contains the collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent other candidate interpretations of the input.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>klassen innehåller samlingen av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>objekt som representerar andra kandidat tolkningar av indata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for MaxAlternates is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet för MaxAlternates är 10.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of alternate results that the speech recognizer returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Maximalt antal alternativa resultat som taligenkänningen returnerar för varje recognition-åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the shared recognizer pauses recognition operations while an application is handling a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om delad tolkning pausar recognition åtgärder när ett program hanterar en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true`, if within the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler your application needs to change the state of the speech recognition service or change the loaded or enabled speech recognition grammars before the speech recognition service processes more input.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen `true`om inom den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelsehanteraren som programmet behöver ändra status för tjänsten speech recognition eller ändra inläst eller aktiverade speech recognition grammatik innan tjänsten speech recognition behandlar mer indata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> property to `true` causes each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler in every application to block the Windows speech recognition service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inställningen den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>egenskapen `true` gör att varje <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelsehanteraren i varje program som ska blockeras tjänsten Windows speech recognition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: To synchronize the changes to the shared recognizer with your application state, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill synkronisera ändringar i delad tolkning med programmets tillstånd, använder den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When PauseRecognizerOnRecognition is `true`, during the execution of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> handler the speech recognition service pauses and buffers new audio input as it arrives.
trans-unit.target: När PauseRecognizerOnRecognition är `true`, under körningen av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>hanterare speech recognition tjänsten pausas och buffrar nya ljudinsignal när den tas emot.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event handler exits, the speech recognition service resumes recognition and starts processing information from its input buffer.
trans-unit.target: En gång i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>händelsehanteraren avslutas, återupptar taligenkänning recognition service och börja bearbeta information från dess indatabufferten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable the speech recognition service, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill aktivera eller inaktivera tjänsten speech recognition, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the shared recognizer waits to process input while any application is handling the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"></xref> event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om delad tolkning väntar med att behandla indata medan alla program hanterar det <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized"> </xref> händelse, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den aktuella platsen för tolken i ljudinsignal som den behandlar.

trans-unit.source: The `RecognizerAudioPosition` property references the recognizer's position in processing its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Den `RecognizerAudioPosition` refererar till den tolken position i dess ljud indata.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Däremot kommer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>refererar till den indataenhet position i den genererade ljudströmmen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Dessa platser kan vara olika.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the RecognizerAudioPosition property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om tolken har tagit emot indata för vilka det har inte ännu genereras ett recognition resultat och sedan värdet på egenskapen RecognizerAudioPosition är mindre än värdet för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för tolken i ljudinsignal som den behandlar.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar information om delade taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: This property returns information about the speech recognizer in use by Windows Speech Recognition.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen returnerar information om taligenkänningen används av Windows-Taligenkänning.

trans-unit.source: Information about the shared speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Information om delade taligenkänningen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer pauses to synchronize recognition and other operations.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när tolken synkronisera recognition och andra åtgärder.

trans-unit.source: Applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause a running instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> before modifying its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Program som måste använda <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>att pausa en pågående instans av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>innan du ändrar dess <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, while the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel när den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>är pausad, du kan läsa in, inaktivera, aktivera och inaktivera <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> raises this event when it is ready to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>genererar den här händelsen när den är redo att acceptera ändringar.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a RecognizerUpdateReached event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en RecognizerUpdateReached kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state.
trans-unit.target: Begäranden att delad tolkning pausa och uppdatera dess tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: När tolken genererar den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>händelse i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>-egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>är `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To provide a user token, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: För att ge en användartoken, använda på <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metod.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ange en förskjutning på ljud position den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Begäranden att delad tolkning pausa och uppdatera dess tillstånd och ger en användartoken för den associerade händelsen.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: När tolken genererar den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>händelse i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>-egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>innehåller värdet för den `userToken` parameter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ange en förskjutning på ljud position den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Användardefinierad information som innehåller information för åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the shared recognizer pause and update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Begäranden att delad tolkning pausa och uppdatera dess tillstånd och ger en förskjutning och en användartoken för den associerade händelsen.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> equals the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> plus the value of the `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Tolken inte initiera begäran om uppdatering tolken förrän tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>är lika med aktuellt <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>plus värdet för den `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate` parameter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: När tolken genererar den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>händelse i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>-egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>innehåller värdet för den `userToken` parameter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Användardefinierad information som innehåller information för åtgärden.

trans-unit.source: The offset from the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition*> to delay the request.
trans-unit.target: Förskjutning från aktuellt <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition*>att fördröja begäran.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när tolken identifierar indata som kan identifiera som tal.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer can raise this event in response to input.
trans-unit.target: Delad tolkning kan öka den här händelsen som svar på indata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> object indicates location in the input stream where the recognizer detected speech.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>egenskapen för den associerade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs>objektet anger plats i Indataströmmen där tolken identifieras tal.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>Egenskaper och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a SpeechDetected event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en SpeechDetected kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när tolken har identifierats på en eller flera ord som kan vara en del av flera hela fraser i en grammatik.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer can raise this event when the input is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: Delad tolkning kan öka den här händelsen när indata är tvetydig.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: Exempelvis för en speech recognition grammatik som stöd för identifiering av antingen "nytt spel du" eller "nytt spel", "nya spel du" entydigt indata och "nytt spel" är tvetydig indata.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a SpeechHypothesized event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en SpeechHypothesized kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that does not match any of the speech recognition grammars it has loaded.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när tolken får indata som inte matchar någon av speech recognition grammatik som den har lästs in.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises this event if it determines that input does not match with sufficient confidence any of the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Delad tolkning genererar den här händelsen om det anger att indata inte överensstämmer med tillräckligt någon inlästa speech recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the rejected <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>innehåller den nekade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Confidence thresholds for the shared recognizer, managed by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, are associated with a user profile and stored in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: Förtroende tröskelvärden för delad tolkning, hanteras av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, som är associerade med en användarprofil och lagras i Windows-registret.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Applications should not write changes to the registry for the properties of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Program bör inte användas för att skriva ändringar i registret för egenskaperna för delad tolkning.

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a SpeechRecognitionRejected event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en SpeechRecognitionRejected kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the recognizer receives input that matches one of its speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när tolken får indata som matchar en av dess speech recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the `SpeechRecognized` event if it determines with sufficient confidence that input matches one of the loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Tolken aktiverar den `SpeechRecognized` händelse om den avgör tillräckligt säkert sätt att indata matchar ett av inlästa och aktiverat tal recognition grammatik.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the accepted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>innehåller den godkända <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Confidence thresholds for the shared recognizer, managed by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, are associated with a user profile and stored in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: Förtroende tröskelvärden för delad tolkning, hanteras av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, som är associerade med en användarprofil och lagras i Windows-registret.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Applications should not write changes to the registry for the properties of the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Program bör inte användas för att skriva ändringar i registret för egenskaperna för delad tolkning.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: När tolken tar emot indata som matchar en grammatik den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt kan öka den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>händelse.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektets <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>händelse utlöses innan den taligenkänningen SpeechRecognized händelse.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a SpeechRecognized event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en SpeechRecognized kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
