trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates whether the shared recognizer resident in Windows is in the `Stopped` or the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: Den här skrivskyddad egenskap anger om delad tolkning i Windows finns i den `Stopped` eller `Listening` tillstånd.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SpeechRecognizer" name="SpeechRecognizer" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tillståndet för den <xref uid="langword_csharp_SpeechRecognizer" name="SpeechRecognizer" href=""> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the running state of the Windows Desktop Speech Technology recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när taligenkänning Windows Desktop tal teknik körs tillstånd ändras.

trans-unit.source: The shared recognizer raises this event when the state of Windows Speech Recognition changes to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> state.
trans-unit.target: Delad tolkning genererar den här händelsen när tillståndet för Windows Taligenkänning ändras till den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>tillstånd.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerState>

trans-unit.source: To get the state of the shared recognizer at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill hämta status för delad tolkning vid tidpunkten för händelsen, använder du <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>egenskapen i associerade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the shared recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: För att få det aktuella tillståndet för delad tolkning, använder du tolken <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a delegate for a StateChanged event, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar ett ombud för en StateChanged kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [händelser och delegater](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Unloads all speech recognition grammars from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Inaktiverar all speech recognition grammatik från delad tolkning.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a grammar asynchronously, this method waits until the grammar is loaded, before it unloads all of the recognizer's grammars.
trans-unit.target: Om tolken för närvarande läser in en grammatik asynkront, väntar tills grammatik har lästs in, innan det inaktiverar alla de tolken grammatik i den här metoden.

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ta bort en specifik grammatik, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified speech recognition grammar from the shared recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Inaktiverar ett angivet tal recognition grammatik från delad tolkning.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Om tolken körs program använda <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>att pausa taligenkänningsmotorn före inläsning av, inaktivera, aktivera eller inaktivera en grammatik.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To unload all grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ta bort all grammatik, använda den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>

trans-unit.source: The grammar to unload.
trans-unit.target: Ta bort grammatik.
